aws_storagegateway_smb_file_share.description: Manages an AWS Storage Gateway SMB File Share

location_arn.description: The ARN of the backed storage used for storing file data.

role_arn.description: The ARN of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM

authentication.description: The authentication method that users use to access the file share. Defaults to `ActiveDirectory`. Valid values: `ActiveDirectory`, `GuestAccess`.

default_storage_class.description: The default storage class for objects put into an Amazon S3 bucket by the file gateway. Defaults to `S3_STANDARD`. Valid values: `S3_STANDARD`, `S3_STANDARD_IA`, `S3_ONEZONE_IA`.

guess_mime_type_enabled.description: Boolean value that enables guessing of the MIME type for uploaded objects based on file extensions. Defaults to `true`.

invalid_user_list.description: A list of users in the Active Directory that are not allowed to access the file share. Only valid if `authentication` is set to `ActiveDirectory`.

kms_encrypted.description: Boolean value if `true` to use Amazon S3 server side encryption with your own AWS KMS key, or `false` to use a key managed by Amazon S3. Defaults to `false`.

smb_file_share_defaults.description: Nested argument with file share default values. More information below.

object_acl.description: Access Control List permission for S3 bucket objects. Defaults to `private`.

read_only.description: Boolean to indicate write status of file share. File share does not accept writes if `true`. Defaults to `false`.

requester_pays.description: Boolean who pays the cost of the request and the data download from the Amazon S3 bucket. Set this value to `true` if you want the requester to pay instead of the bucket owner. Defaults to `false`.

valid_user_list.description: A list of users in the Active Directory that are allowed to access the file share. Only valid if `authentication` is set to `ActiveDirectory`.
